website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers Matera Graftel overall is a good pair for everyday activities. It has good cushioning with its Air-Cooled Memory Foam insole and shock absorbing midsole that provides all-day comfort and support.  It’s a slip-on sneaker that’s easy to slide in and out. The clean and simple design is paired with different neutral colorways that easily match any outfit for any occasion.
pros: A lot of users love the Skechers Matera Graftel for its easy slip-on design that’s hassle-free to wear on and off
Numerous wearers claim that the pair is very breathable and keeps the foot dry when wearing for long hours
A lot of customers love the colorways available that are neutral and perfect for an everyday shoe because they easily go with any outfit
Many users claim that the pair is extremely comfortable to walk in and has a great in-shoe feel
Some users like that the Matera Graftel sneakers from Skechers are equally comfortable to wear with or without socks on
Numerous reviewers claim that the shoe is lightweight
A number of users say that the Air-Cooled Memory Foam insole gives great cushioning that feels like walking on clouds
A few wearers say that it’s a good work sneaker that’s breathable, provides lasting comfort, and is very lightweight
cons: A reviewer says that the opening is a little narrow and requires a bit of effort to get on
A user comments that the heel feels sloppy

customer_reviews.title: Extreme Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes (and he is not a man who generally loves shoes at all). He believes they are the most comfortable shoes he has ever worn and has worn them every day since they arrived in the mail. He actually puts them on as soon as he gets home from work. They are lightweight and airy. They seem to lift from the ankle, cushioning the bottom of the foot with each step. I ordered the taupe & am very happy with the color. They match well with everything.
customer_reviews.author: MaryB

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy in the Heel, Tight in the Toe.
customer_reviews.text: Just like the title says. The shoes need to be wider up front and tighter in the rear. My ankle kept popping out the back every step. Returned them. It's a shame since I am a big fan of this elastic knit kind of shoe. I just wish someone would make them proper for wider 3E and 4E feet.
customer_reviews.author: Washington State

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. They are slipper-comfy but at the same time they provide enough structure and support that he can wear them anywhere all day. They seem to be holding up after a lot of use and they still look cool. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for Convalescing Feet.
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked wearing leather Skechers, but they didn't have those with the right cut since my first purchase on Amazon. This is different. With an Amazon basicware socks this particular design is quite comfy. It's a tad large for a US 13. We'll see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: AainaA

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: I bought these since Teva no longer makes my old favorite slip on. It turns out these are much better and cost less. The fit is perfect, but most important to me is the comfort and support. Many of my shoes leave ne feeling a bit wobbly on my feet, these do not. The best stability ever. The upper is sock like, they are as comfortable as a pair of socks, and just as easy to put on. But they have the support of a real pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Lang

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes to date.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair, first one survived for 2 years and is my favorite shoes now. Hopefully they don`t discontinue them when I need next pair. Comfortable and easy to put on, no shoehorn needed. mesh top is great for ventilation purposes, no more stinky feet.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these Skechers in a retailer last year and they were getting worn. Couldn't find them anywhere until they popped in my Amazon searches. Shoes come in actual Skechers box with normal packaged supports inside and were an exact replacement. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SteveG

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shoes for the office
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are comfortable and priced right. Light weight and the memory cushion makes them even more comfortable. Highly recommend for an around the office type of shoe. I would be a bit concerned wearing these outdoors often as they do not appear to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: Developed a limp
customer_reviews.text: I may have received a pair of counterfeit shoes because I ordered 2 pairs and the other people say theirs are ok but the tow lining immediately came off in mine and I’m looking a new shoes because I’ve developed leg and foot pain from these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Black Bees

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes! Really picky shoe wearer!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! They look really nice. I got these to try with Amazon wardrobe after having brain surgery and after I found out I had cancer and need back surgery. These were a little tight for a couple of days, but now I am able to slip them on without much issue. They are super comfortable, light and breathable. I will be buying another pair very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Wayne Winkles

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted some slip on shoes to wear with some of his shorts. He loves these shoes. They are made of a nice material that is also breathable. They slip on easy and my husband says they are extremely comfortable. We have ordered him 2 more pairs in the other colors.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Not the Slip-on i was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: I was just looking for something to wear as indoor shoes. These were a mess. The length and width fit as a 14 should. but the body of it fit very loose. Like they may fall off while wearing. The black sole was very plastic feeling. I did not enjoy these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: attention to the measures
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same item in the same size in one store and the same size in that Amazon store I want a big one, you know why the two products are identical badly bought in different places
customer_reviews.author: Oreste

customer_reviews.title: as described and looks great
customer_reviews.text: great price, comfortable fit, love to walk in them. i had a blue and the green i ordered was 60% less on sale. love them hurry and buy! Sizes is correct and fits well. Great traveling shoe.
customer_reviews.author: donnyj

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Worn it for a few months, Still loks new. Doesn’t seem to gather dirt and stains like most shoes. Very comfortable and looks good. My only complains would be that you can feel the breeze through the mesh, so not great for winter wear.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Beier

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look great and are so comfortable I was surprised how they made my feet feel better. These shoes have to be the best pair of sketchers I have ever owned. What a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Bottoms do not last long and start slipping easily
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most comfortable shoes I have worn ina long time however the bottoms do not last very long. I walk everyday in these shoes and have had to order 2 pairs in the span of 4 months. The most recent pair I have had for 2 weeks and already the bottoms are worn out. This is the only problem I see with these shoes, make the bottom last longer and I will gladly pay $100 per pair, right now they worth about $20-30 a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Dreadfyah

customer_reviews.title: Great price and fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a high arch and very weird feet in general due to a deformity. So I struggle to find good shoes that fit me and won’t make me feel like I’m wearing a kid’s shoe. These are very comfy at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for the last two months. So far, i have had no discomfort. The fit is not extremely snug - if you are planning to use it as running shoes. These are good value walking shoes. I have been using it daily while going to work. I usually wear 10.5W. Since that size was not available, i ordered 11M. The fit is good.
customer_reviews.author: Karthik

customer_reviews.title: most comfortable shoe i have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: first day with this shoe. most comfortable shoe i have ever owned. only been a day though i cannot believe that they will get less comfortable. i have a pair of laced skechers that are also great.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey tucker

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not a “wide” shoe
customer_reviews.text: Compared this “wide fit” to a normal bike running shoe and the width was the same. Disappointing that they market this as a wide shoe but the sole is the exact same size as a regular running shoe. If you are going to make a wide shoe, don’t just make more fabric on the top, make the sole bigger. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband thanks me every day for these shoes. He just loves them. He says they are the most comfortable walking shoe. He wears them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Wide size not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Other Skecher's at same size fit better. This was too tight. The knitted "sock" collar made them difficult to slip on, which is one of the main reasons to buy Skechers in the first place. I ended up returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Holley

customer_reviews.title: Runs big!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Only issue is they run at least 1/2 - 1 size larger. Had to return for smaller size. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe had a high cuff and was unable to put them on. I returned them and have yet to receive a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻 Highly recommended 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for me. Happy with those to wear often. Not high on shoes with laces that don't stay on good. Ha. This will do!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I was looking for something easy to put on when taking the dog out. I was pleasantly surprised. I now wear them all the time. So comfy, and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Walking on clouds
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes.He broke his heel a few years ago.Shoes are a problem for him.He put these on and wears them constantly.And the price of 25.00 .Sweeten the deal
customer_reviews.author: number one mimi

customer_reviews.title: SUPER Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My third pair of this style. GREAT comfort, memory foam insole. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus L. Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable skechers
customer_reviews.text: I always buy skechers, and this time I wanted to buy a pair with memory foam. It fits perfectly and very comfortable. I used more than 10 days and really lovin it.
customer_reviews.author: Kumar C

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: SO SO comfortable. Love them...I'll wear these only going forward.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kobielsky

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and good support. Easy to put on and take off. Thick sock might be a little bit harder to put on that is why I prefer thinner sock. It is good, I like the wide fir.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne C. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Not a fan of the tongue area, tends to fold in when slipping shoe on
customer_reviews.author: Wendell Barbee

customer_reviews.title: Returned.
customer_reviews.text: I have had two toes amputated and they didn't fit well. Good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on further
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very comfortable and easy to put on how to take off I wear mine all the summer. Next year may have to buy another pair. Light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and look good too
customer_reviews.text: Took them out of the box sliding on my feet and fit just the way they should
customer_reviews.author: douglas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for a wide foot
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely comfortable and light weight. Easy slip on.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of sneakers. Been using them for a while and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Heynner Troyo

customer_reviews.title: Comfy breathable slip-on
customer_reviews.text: These Sketcher's are extremely comfy, bouncy and breathable. Great weekend errand shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Christy R

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying and returning too many loafers searching for the right pair. I need width, support, shock absorbing, slip on, a slightly wide sole for stability, etc... I finally found it in these Sketchers. Just like my last quest. works great for my perm injury.
customer_reviews.author: ken forrester

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with these, he absolutely loved them and said they are extremely comfortable. Will buy them in different colors. Feels like he didn’t even have a shoe on.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fitting and good looking shoes.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes 👟 fit very good, make sure you get the correct width when ordering as it makes quite a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Wark

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe reminds me of wearing diving flipper shoe, with a sole to walk on.
customer_reviews.author: Jack2

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: My big foot son loves these. Easy to slap on and wide for the wide foot giant I have.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: First pair of sketchers
customer_reviews.text: Good comfortable extremely light weight pair of shoes. Satisfied with fit and quality. First pair of Sketchers I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Davis

customer_reviews.title: Average but price was decent
customer_reviews.text: They run a full size and half large, make sure you wear socks, or they will smell!
customer_reviews.author: Randal

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, nearly a slipper.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, soft, and very breathable. The soles are wearing through rapidly, they won't last the summer.
customer_reviews.author: B.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I have. I love them most comfortable shoes I've ever owned. Buy them and we will say this too.
customer_reviews.author: Benef Medlock

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the Sketchers, this is the second pair I have and will be ordering more. Very, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: K. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: Great fit (wide shoe), great price. Held up well on my 12 year old son. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I had recently bought a pair of beige ones that were a super sale liked them a lot very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Bill C.

customer_reviews.title: Right shoe is bigger than the left
customer_reviews.text: NO KIDDING! ARE THESE SECONDS? I DIDN'T KNOW I WAS BUYING SECONDS. THAT SHOULD HAVE BEEN STATED. BUT they are comfy. I hope they hold up. Maybe it was a bad idea buying them online?
customer_reviews.author: bags

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: Hassle-free everyday shoes. I expected a bit more cushion on the memory foam as compared to other sketcher models. But it's not bad at all for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sambit M.

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever made
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes ever. I spent another 300 on more pairs
customer_reviews.author: michael velasquez

customer_reviews.title: comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for summer very comfortable keep my feet cool.
customer_reviews.author: GREGORY L. WEBSTER

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: I wear them on my boat, very comfortable, couldn’t ask for a better shoe I highly recommend buying
customer_reviews.author: Gene G

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were a little big, I take a 10.5 and should have gone with a 10, other than that, these shoes are extremely comfortable, they keep my feet cool and dry, I love them
customer_reviews.author: red

customer_reviews.title: Really Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable s Lip on shoes I’ve ever worn
customer_reviews.author: Robert Richelieu

customer_reviews.title: Not slip on
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. I need room in toe pocket and there is plenty. They are not slip on ,side walls are soft.
customer_reviews.author: Apropmaker

customer_reviews.title: Feels like I’m wearing light weight slippers
customer_reviews.text: Could not believe how light and comfortable a shoe could be.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Denton

customer_reviews.title: I love my skechers, very durable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and they are true to size
customer_reviews.author: Glen E Boggs Jr

customer_reviews.title: Initial tight fit
customer_reviews.text: Initial fit was tight once I got it on and broken in a little it was good.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: A true size
customer_reviews.text: The Skechers I bought are very comfortable for walking . I was a little worry about size for the fit but the they fit great . I always buy a half size bigger because I have a wide foot but these were made just right .
customer_reviews.author: Richard Delacono

customer_reviews.title: Small Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoe opening too small even on the wide size 11. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: comfortable out of the box
customer_reviews.text: just what was expected of the brand - comfort and style
customer_reviews.author: clydesluggo

customer_reviews.title: Comfy. Fit slightly big.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy. Look good. Fit slightly bigger than black ones I bought in store.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Truly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, stylish, fit well, and it is like walking on air.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, my husband love it. Easy to slip on and slip out
customer_reviews.author: STHM_Honest Review

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are supportive and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I have pain in legs caused by back condition , wear shoes in home . Work very well for me as I use them as house shoes. Light weight and conform well to my feet because they fit high on top front of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ed M

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Very light and flexible but when used driving they pinch a bit in the upper shoe area that bends before the tongue.
customer_reviews.author: Larry G. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This I my second pair, I have neuropathy from chemo treatments and these shoes are very comforting plus light weight and easy to take on and off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really light and comfortable. Bought them for my husband who was having shoulder surgery because they slipped on. Now he wants to wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Look & fit is great. I was expecting more cushion for the heel, but it is still a very comfortable shoe and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It fits just good.
customer_reviews.text: When you wear the shoe, eveything feels good except it is not smooth when you walk.
customer_reviews.author: ZZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight shoe easy on easy off and looks good
customer_reviews.author: RJR

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes wear out very quickly. Only used for essentially house slippers to avoid a sore heal. Not bad for the price, though.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and good looking
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking shoe. Good for slipping on to run errands and nice enough to wear out to dinner.
customer_reviews.author: jpasana

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money. Comfortable. Just got them for around the house instead of slippers. They were on sale
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Slip on easy
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Slip on easy and super comfortable. I now have two pair and plan on a third.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Comfy slip on.
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe, good price. I never buy slip on shoe but took a chance and my high arch and top of ankle are very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Marshall

customer_reviews.title: My feet say Thank You
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoe I've ever worn. I am thinking of purchasing another pair. My feet thank me every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfy shoes. I'll never wear sneakers unless I have to. I'm a fan of these for life.
customer_reviews.author: Henry C

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fit great I usually need 4 e and these fit great !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipment was quick and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Just got them and have only worn them for two days but very comfortable and easy to slip on.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Pfotenhauer

customer_reviews.title: good shoes
customer_reviews.text: it feels weird but its okay. its not supporting my ankle too much
customer_reviews.author: JKozlowski

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: No problems.perfect fit with wide fitting.Will be buying more when product returns.THANKS
customer_reviews.author: keith osullivan

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't wear them if I was touring Disney but going out and about they're good to go
customer_reviews.author: tk

customer_reviews.title: runs a size large
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 13 regular (or narrow) in almost every shoe, even my last pair of slip on sketchers, but these I wear a 12. Other than that great comfortable good looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Love

customer_reviews.title: Great summer shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great fittings shoe. Extremely easy to put on. Got rid of my bulky diabetic shoes. These are a dream. Wonderful that Amazon carries larger sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Skechers And I am very impressed with them. They fit Great. great walking shoes. I will definitely order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Fontaine Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Matera Graftel Loafer
product_meta.description: Amazing comfort and sleek sporty style in this SKECHERS® Matera Graftel sneakers! Knit textile upper. Slip-on design with pull-tab at back. Closed, round-toe silhouette. Breathable textile lining and man-made insole. Air-Cooled Memory Foam™ insole cushions during foot impact. Cushioned PVC midsole offers extra cushion. Synthetic outsole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 9 oz Product measurements were taken using size 12, width EE - Wide. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
